conbody.p: Within 15 calendar days following notification of resolution of a GAO protest, the contracting officer must send a bid protest action report in the format in 5153.303-6 (double spaced between item numbers) to the following addressees:
(a) AMC contracting activities send the report to the addressee in 5101.290(b)(7).
(b) USACE contracting activities send the report to
(c) All other contracting activities send the report to the addressee in 5133.104(a)(3)(i)(1)(iii).
